LanguageData.ShieldSetting_UseShieldBuilding_Tooltip: Configure whether to load this mod's shield building content\n\nChanging this setting requires restarting the game
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_UseShieldNetwork_Tooltip: Configure whether to load this mod's shield network content\n\nChanging this setting requires restarting the game
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_BuildingDmgGlobalFactor_To: Shield generator energy loss multiplier, this setting only affects shields carried by this mod's shield buildings
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_MinRadiusOffset_Tooltip: Adjustment value relative to base minimum radius, positive values increase, negative values decrease
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_MaxRadiusOffset_Tooltip: Adjustment value relative to base maximum radius, used to expand or contract shield coverage area
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_RechargeTimeFactor_Tooltip: Multiplier for wait time before recharge begins after shield breaks, higher values mean longer wait times
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_RechargeRateFactor_Tooltip: Multiplier for energy percentage instantly restored when recharge completes, affects energy percentage recovered per recharge cycle
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_MaxEnergyFactor_Tooltip: Scaling factor for total shield energy capacity, higher values make shields more durable
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ChargeSpeed_Tooltip: Multiplier for energy recovered per second, higher values mean faster charging
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_DisarmedByEmpTimeFactor_To: Adjustment factor for shield system disable duration after EMP attack
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_SlowChargeFactor_Tooltip: Charge speed multiplier when shield is not connected to network
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ResourceToMinRadius_Toolti: Shield minimum radius offset provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ResourceToMaxRadius_Toolti: Shield maximum radius offset provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ResourceToRechargeSeconds_: Reduced recharge wait time per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ResourceToRechargeRate_Too: Energy percentage restored upon recharge completion provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ResourceToMaxEnergy_Toolti: Shield maximum energy offset provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_ResourceToChargeSpeed_Tool: Shield charge speed multiplier provided per shield network resource point
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_UseKineticEnergy_Tooltip: When enabled, energy loss is calculated based on projectile kinetic energy rather than damage
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_NormalKineticEnergyFactor_: Scaling factor for normal projectile kinetic energy calculation
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_MortarKineticEnergyFactor_: Scaling factor for arcing projectile kinetic energy calculation
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_RenderAlphaFactor_Tooltip: Adjusts transparency level of shield visual effects, lower values make shields more transparent
LanguageData.ShieldSetting_HitEffectLastFactor_Toolti: Adjusts duration of visual effects when shield is hit, higher values mean effects display longer
